Students participating in music courses are encouraged to learn about music theory and composition, while also performing on their instrument of choice. Some instruments of the music department include by are not limited to guitars, bass guitars, drums, piano, trumpet, tambourine, alto saxophone and tenor saxophone. The music department has also given birth to talented and aspiring musicians that include but not are limited to local bands J.I.N and Hydroplane.
